edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.adaptation

Class Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.adaptation.Stats

  • public class Stats
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for estimating a MLLR transform for each cluster of data. The clustering must be previously performed using ClusteredDensityFileData.java

      • collect

        public void collect(SpeechResult result)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used for directly collect and use counts. The counts are collected and stored separately for each cluster.
        Parameters:
        result - Result object to collect counts from.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something went wrong
